analysis.description:
HammerChainBeta (/unique_chucks/24/0x1aad546be24ce0a36d0586c0d605296c2751bdf0.sol#5-230) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0x1aad546be24ce0a36d0586c0d605296c2751bdf0.sol#146-153)

HammerChainBeta.sendFounders (/unique_chucks/24/0x1aad546be24ce0a36d0586c0d605296c2751bdf0.sol#72-81) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeFounders == 0x0 || timeFounders < now

HammerChainBeta.sendFounders (/unique_chucks/24/0x1aad546be24ce0a36d0586c0d605296c2751bdf0.sol#72-81) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeFounders == 0x0 || timeFounders < now
HammerChainBeta.sendIncentive (/unique_chucks/24/0x1aad546be24ce0a36d0586c0d605296c2751bdf0.sol#57-72) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeIncentive == 0x0
